sentences.text_local: 海伦：家里没有人吗？

sentences.text_foreign: JIM: I'll knock again, Helen.
sentences.text_local: 吉姆：海伦，我再敲一次。

sentences.text_foreign: JIM: Everything's very quiet.
sentences.text_local: 吉姆：毫无动静

sentences.text_foreign: JIM: I'm sure there's no one at home.
sentences.text_local: 吉姆：肯定家里没有人。

sentences.text_foreign: HELEN: But that's impossible.
sentences.text_local: 海伦：但这是不可能的。

sentences.text_foreign: HELEN: Carol and Tom invited us to lunch.
sentences.text_local: 海伦：卡罗尔和汤姆邀请我们来吃午饭。

sentences.text_foreign: HELEN: Look through the window.
sentences.text_local: 海伦：从窗子往里看看。

sentences.text_foreign: HELEN: Can you see anything?
sentences.text_local: 海伦：你能看见什么吗？

sentences.text_foreign: JIM: Nothing at all.
sentences.text_local: 吉姆：什么也看不见。

sentences.text_foreign: HELEN: Let's try the back door.
sentences.text_local: 海伦：让我们到后门去试试。

sentences.text_foreign: JIM: Look! Everyone's in the garden.
sentences.text_local: 吉姆：瞧！大家都在花园里。

sentences.text_foreign: CAROL: Hello, Helen.
sentences.text_local: 卡罗尔：你好，海伦。

sentences.text_foreign: CAROL: Hello, Jim.
sentences.text_local: 卡罗尔：你好，吉姆。

sentences.text_foreign: TOM: Everybody wants to have lunch in the garden.
sentences.text_local: 汤姆：大家都想在花园里吃午饭。

sentences.text_foreign: TOM: It's nice and warm out here.
sentences.text_local: 汤姆：这外面挺暖和。

sentences.text_foreign: CAROL: Come and have something to drink.
sentences.text_local: 卡罗尔：来喝点什么。

sentences.text_foreign: JIM: Thanks, Carol.
sentences.text_local: 吉姆：谢谢，卡罗尔。

sentences.text_foreign: JIM: May I have a glass of beer please?
sentences.text_local: 吉姆：给我一杯啤酒好吗？

sentences.text_foreign: CAROL: Beer?
sentences.text_local: 卡罗尔：啤酒？

sentences.text_foreign: CAROL: There's none left.
sentences.text_local: 卡罗尔：一点都不剩了。

sentences.text_foreign: CAROL: You can have some lemonade.
sentences.text_local: 卡罗尔：你可以喝点柠檬水。

sentences.text_foreign: JIM: Lemonade!
sentences.text_local: 吉姆：柠檬水！

sentences.text_foreign: TOM: Don't believe her, Jim.
sentences.text_local: 汤姆：吉姆，别信她的。

sentences.text_foreign: TOM: She's only joking.
sentences.text_local: 汤姆：她只是在开玩笑。

sentences.text_foreign: TOM: Have some beer!
sentences.text_local: 汤姆：喝点啤酒吧！

sentences.text_foreign: Tommy's breakfast
sentences.text_local: 汤米的早餐

sentences.text_foreign: What does she mean by 'change' in the last sentence?
sentences.text_local: 最后一句话中的“chang”是什么意思？

sentences.text_foreign: When my husband was going into the dining room this morning,
sentences.text_local: 今天早晨我丈夫走进饭厅时，

sentences.text_foreign: he dropped some coins on the floor.
sentences.text_local: 把一些硬币掉在地上了。

sentences.text_foreign: There were coins everywhere.
sentences.text_local: 到处都是硬币。

sentences.text_foreign: We looked for them, but we could not find them all.
sentences.text_local: 我们虽然找了，但没能把它们全部找到。

sentences.text_foreign: While we were having breakfast,
sentences.text_local: 正当我们吃早饭时，

sentences.text_foreign: our little boy, Tommy, found two small coins on the floor.
sentences.text_local: 我们的小男孩汤米在地上找到了两枚小硬币。

sentences.text_foreign: He put them both into his mouth.
sentences.text_local: 他把这两枚硬币全都放进了嘴里。

sentences.text_foreign: We both tried to get the coins, but it was too late.
sentences.text_local: 我们俩都试图把这两枚硬币拿出来，但太迟了。

sentences.text_foreign: Tommy had already swallowed them!
sentences.text_local: 汤米已经把硬币咽了下去。

sentences.text_foreign: Later that morning,
sentences.text_local: 那天上午的晚些时候，

sentences.text_foreign: when I was doing the housework,
sentences.text_local: 当我正在做家务时，

sentences.text_foreign: my husband phoned me from the office.
sentences.text_local: 我丈夫从办公室打来电话。

sentences.text_foreign: How's Tommy?' he asked.
sentences.text_local: “汤米怎么样？” 他问。

sentences.text_foreign: I don't know,' I answered,
sentences.text_local: “我不知道，” 我回答说，

sentences.text_foreign: Tommy's been to the toilet three times this morning,
sentences.text_local: “今天上午汤米去了3次厕所了，

sentences.text_foreign: but I haven't had any change yet!'
sentences.text_local: 但我还没看到硬币！”

sentences.text_foreign: A true story
sentences.text_local: 一个真实的故事

sentences.text_foreign: Who called out to the thieves in the dark?
sentences.text_local: 谁在暗处对窃贼喊了一声？

sentences.text_foreign: Do you like stories?
sentences.text_local: 你喜欢听故事吗？

sentences.text_foreign: I want to tell you a true story.
sentences.text_local: 我要告诉你一个真实的故事。

sentences.text_foreign: It happened to a friend of mine a year ago.
sentences.text_local: 这是一年前发生在我的一个朋友身上的故事。

sentences.text_foreign: While my friend, George, was reading in bed,
sentences.text_local: 当我的朋友乔治在床上看书时，

sentences.text_foreign: two thieves climbed into his kitchen.
sentences.text_local: 两个小偷爬进了他的厨房。

sentences.text_foreign: After they had entered the house, they went into the dining room.
sentences.text_local: 他们进到屋里后，走进了饭厅。

sentences.text_foreign: It was very dark, so they turned on a torch.
sentences.text_local: 饭厅里很暗，于是他们打开了手电筒。

sentences.text_foreign: Suddenly, they heard a voice behind them.
sentences.text_local: 突然他们听到身后有声音。

sentences.text_foreign: 'What's up? What's up?' someone called.
sentences.text_local: “什么事？什么事？” 有人叫着。

sentences.text_foreign: The thieves dropped the torch and ran away as quickly as they could.
sentences.text_local: 小偷扔下了手电筒，飞快地逃走了。

sentences.text_foreign: George heard the noise and came downstairs quickly.
sentences.text_local: 乔治听到了响声，迅速地下了楼。

sentences.text_foreign: He turned on the light, but he couldn't see anyone.
sentences.text_local: 他开了灯，但不见一个人。

sentences.text_foreign: The thieves had already gone.
sentences.text_local: 小偷逃走了。

sentences.text_foreign: But George's parrot, Henry, was still there.
sentences.text_local: 但是乔治的鹦鹉亨利仍在那里。

sentences.text_foreign: 'What's up, George?' he called.
sentences.text_local: “什么事，乔治？” 它叫着。

sentences.text_foreign: 'Nothing, Henry,' George said and smiled.
sentences.text_local: “没事，亨利。” 乔治笑着说，

sentences.text_foreign: 'Go back to sleep.'
sentences.text_local: “接着睡觉吧”

sentences.text_foreign: The man in a hat
sentences.text_local: 戴帽子的男士

sentences.text_foreign: Why didn't Caroline recognize the customer straight away?
sentences.text_local: 为什么卡罗琳没有马上认出那位顾客？

sentences.text_foreign: CUSTOMER: I bought two expensive dictionaries here half an hour ago,
sentences.text_local: 顾客：半小时以前我在这里买了两本很贵的辞典，

sentences.text_foreign: CUSTOMER: but I forgot to take them with me.
sentences.text_local: 顾客：但是我忘了拿走。

sentences.text_foreign: MANAGER: Who served you, sir?
sentences.text_local: 经理：是谁接待您的，先生？

sentences.text_foreign: CUSTOMER: The lady who is standing behind the counter.
sentences.text_local: 顾客：站在柜台后面的那位女士。

sentences.text_foreign: MANAGER: Which books did you buy?
sentences.text_local: 经理：您买的是两本什么书？

sentences.text_foreign: CUSTOMER: The books which are on the counter.
sentences.text_local: 顾客：就是柜台上的那两本。

sentences.text_foreign: MANAGER: Did you serve this gentleman half an hour ago, Caroline?
sentences.text_local: 经理：卡罗琳，半小时前你接待过这位先生吗？

sentences.text_foreign: MANAGER: He says he's the man who bought these books.
sentences.text_local: 经理：他说他就是买这两本书的人。

sentences.text_foreign: CAROLINE: I can't remember.
sentences.text_local: 卡罗琳：我记不起来了。

sentences.text_foreign: CAROLINE: The man who I served was wearing a hat.
sentences.text_local: 卡罗琳：我接待的那个人戴着一顶帽子。

sentences.text_foreign: MANAGER: Have you got a hat, sir?
sentences.text_local: 经理：先生，您有帽子吗？

sentences.text_foreign: CUSTOMER: Yes, I have.
sentences.text_local: 顾客：有的，我有帽子。

sentences.text_foreign: MANAGER: Would you put it on, please?
sentences.text_local: 经理：请您把帽子戴上好吗？

sentences.text_foreign: CUSTOMER: All right.
sentences.text_local: 顾客：好吧。

sentences.text_foreign: MANAGER: Is this the man that you served, Caroline?
sentences.text_local: 经理：卡罗琳，这就是你接待过的那个人吗？

sentences.text_foreign: CAROLINE: Yes, I recognize him now.
sentences.text_local: 卡罗琳：是他。我现在认出他来了。

sentences.text_foreign: A trip to Australia
sentences.text_local: 澳大利亚之行

sentences.text_foreign: Who is the man with the beard?
sentences.text_local: 那个长着络腮胡子的人是谁？

sentences.text_foreign: MIKE: Look, Scott.
sentences.text_local: 迈克：看，斯科特。

sentences.text_foreign: MIKE: This is a photograph I look during my trip to Australia.
sentences.text_local: 迈克：这是我到澳大利亚旅行时拍的一张照片。

sentences.text_foreign: SCOTT: Let me see it, Mike.
sentences.text_local: 斯科特：让我看看，迈克。

sentences.text_foreign: SCOTT: This is a good photograph.
sentences.text_local: 斯科特：这是一张很好的照片。

sentences.text_foreign: SCOTT: Who are these people?
sentences.text_local: 斯科特：这些人是谁？

sentences.text_foreign: MIKE: They're people I met during the trip.
sentences.text_local: 迈克：他们是我旅行时认识的人。

sentences.text_foreign: MIKE: That's the ship we travelled on.
sentences.text_local: 迈克：这是我们所乘的那条船。

sentences.text_foreign: SCOTT: What a beautiful ship!
sentences.text_local: 斯科特：多漂亮的船啊！

sentences.text_foreign: SCOTT: Who's this?
sentences.text_local: 斯科特：这是谁？

sentences.text_foreign: MIKE: That's the man I told you about.
sentences.text_local: 迈克：这就是我跟你说过的那个人。

sentences.text_foreign: MIKE: Remember?
sentences.text_local: 迈克：还记得吗？

sentences.text_foreign: SCOTT: Ah yes.
sentences.text_local: 斯科特：啊，记得。

sentences.text_foreign: SCOTT: The one who offered you a job in Australia.
sentences.text_local: 斯科特：就是在澳大利亚给你工作做的那个人。

sentences.text_foreign: MIKE: That's right.
sentences.text_local: 迈克：对。

sentences.text_foreign: SCOTT: Who's this?
sentences.text_local: 斯科特：这是谁？

sentences.text_foreign: MIKE: Guess!
sentences.text_local: 迈克：你猜！

sentences.text_foreign: SCOTT: It's not you, is it?
sentences.text_local: 斯科特：这不是你，对吗？

sentences.text_foreign: MIKE: That's right.
sentences.text_local: 迈克：不，是我。

sentences.text_foreign: MIKE: I grew a beard during the trip,
sentences.text_local: 迈克：我在旅行时留了胡子，

sentences.text_foreign: MIKE: but I shaved it off when I came home.
sentences.text_local: 迈克：但我回到家时就把它刮了。

sentences.text_foreign: SCOTT: Why did you shave it off?
sentences.text_local: 斯科特：你为什么把它刮了？

sentences.text_foreign: MIKE: My wife didn't like it!
sentences.text_local: 迈克：我妻子不喜欢！

sentences.text_foreign: Tea for two
sentences.text_local: 两个人一起喝茶

sentences.text_foreign: Does Susan have tea by herself?
sentences.text_local: 苏珊是一个人喝茶吗？

sentences.text_foreign: SUSAN: Can't you come in and have tea now, Peter?
sentences.text_local: 苏珊：彼得，你现在能进来喝茶吗？

sentences.text_foreign: PETER: Not yet.
sentences.text_local: 彼得：还不能。

sentences.text_foreign: PETER: I must water the garden first.
sentences.text_local: 彼得：我得先给花园浇水。

sentences.text_foreign: SUSAN: Do you have to water it now?
sentences.text_local: 苏珊：你一定得现在浇吗？

sentences.text_foreign: PETER: I'm afraid I must.
sentences.text_local: 彼得：恐怕我得现在浇。

sentences.text_foreign: PETER: Look at it! It's terribly dry.
sentences.text_local: 彼得：你看看，干得厉害。

sentences.text_foreign: SUSAN: What a nuisance!
sentences.text_local: 苏珊：真讨厌！

sentences.text_foreign: PETER: Last summer it was very dry, too.
sentences.text_local: 彼得：去年夏天也是干得很。

sentences.text_foreign: PETER: Don't you remember?
sentences.text_local: 彼得：你不记得了吗？

sentences.text_foreign: PETER: I had to water it every day.
sentences.text_local: 彼得：我不得不每天浇水。

sentences.text_foreign: SUSAN: Well, I'll have tea by myself.
sentences.text_local: 苏珊：好吧，我一个人喝茶了。

sentences.text_foreign: SUSAN: That was quick!
sentences.text_local: 苏珊：好快啊！

sentences.text_foreign: SUSAN: Have you finished already?
sentences.text_local: 苏珊：你已经浇完了？

sentences.text_foreign: PETER: Yes.
sentences.text_local: 彼得：是的。

sentences.text_foreign: PETER: Look out of the window.
sentences.text_local: 彼得：你看看窗外。

sentences.text_foreign: SUSAN: It's raining!
sentences.text_local: 苏珊：下雨了！

sentences.text_foreign: SUSAN: That means you don't need to water the garden.
sentences.text_local: 苏珊：这就是说，你不必给花园浇水了。

sentences.text_foreign: PETER: That was a pleasant surprise.
sentences.text_local: 彼得：这是意想不到的好事。

sentences.text_foreign: PETER: It means I can have tea, instead.
sentences.text_local: 彼得：这意味着我反倒可以喝茶了。

sentences.text_foreign: A Famous actress
sentences.text_local: 著名的女演员

sentences.text_foreign: Who is only twenty-nine, and why is it so unclear?
sentences.text_local: 谁只有29岁？为什么这件事如此含糊不清？

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: Can you recognize that woman, Liz?
sentences.text_local: 凯特：莉兹，你能认出那个女人吗？

sentences.text_foreign: LIZ: I think I can, Kate.
sentences.text_local: 莉兹：我想我认得出来，凯特。

sentences.text_foreign: LIZ: It must be Karen Marsh, the actress.
sentences.text_local: 莉兹：那一定是女演员卡伦・马什。

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: I thought so.
sentences.text_local: 凯特：我也这样想。

sentences.text_foreign: LIZ: Who's that beside her?
sentences.text_local: 莉兹：她旁边的那个人是谁？

sentences.text_foreign: LIZ: That must be Conrad Reeves.
sentences.text_local: 莉兹：一定是康拉德・里弗斯。

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: Conrad Reeves, the actor?
sentences.text_local: 凯特：康拉德・里弗斯，那个男演员吗？

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: It can't be.
sentences.text_local: 凯特：不可能是。

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: Let me have another look.
sentences.text_local: 凯特：让我再看一看。

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: I think you're right!
sentences.text_local: 凯特：我想你是对的。

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: Isn't he her third husband?
sentences.text_local: 凯特：他不是她的第3个丈夫吗？

sentences.text_foreign: LIZ: No. He must be her fourth or fifth.
sentences.text_local: 莉兹：不，他一定是她的第4个或第5个丈夫。

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: Doesn't Karen Marsh look old!
sentences.text_local: 凯特：卡伦看上去不显老嘛！

sentences.text_foreign: LIZ: She does, doesn't she!
sentences.text_local: 莉兹：是的，谁说不是呢！

sentences.text_foreign: LIZ: I read she's twenty-nine,
sentences.text_local: 莉兹：我从报上看到她是29岁，

sentences.text_foreign: LIZ: but she must be at least forty.
sentences.text_local: 莉兹：但她一定至少有40岁了。

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: I'm sure she is.
sentences.text_local: 凯特：我肯定她有40岁了。

sentences.text_foreign: LIZ: She was a famous actress when I was still at school.
sentences.text_local: 莉兹：当我还是学生时，她就是个著名的演员了。

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: That was a long time ago, wasn't it?
sentences.text_local: 凯特：那是好久以前的事了，是吗？

sentences.text_foreign: LIZ: Not that long ago!
sentences.text_local: 莉兹：不，没有那么久。

sentences.text_foreign: LIZ: I'm not more than twenty-nine myself.
sentences.text_local: 莉兹：我自己现在还没29岁呢。

sentences.text_foreign: Seventy miles an hour
sentences.text_local: 时速70英里

sentences.text_foreign: What does Ann advise her husband to do next time?
sentences.text_local: 安建议她的丈夫下次做什么？

sentences.text_foreign: ANN: Look, Gary!
sentences.text_local: 安：瞧，加里！

sentences.text_foreign: ANN: That policeman's waving to you.
sentences.text_local: 安：那个警察正朝你挥手呢。

sentences.text_foreign: ANN: He wants you to stop.
sentences.text_local: 安：他要你停下来。

sentences.text_foreign: POLICEMAN: Where do you think you are?
sentences.text_local: 警察：你认为你现在是在哪儿？

sentences.text_foreign: POLICEMAN: On a race track?
sentences.text_local: 警察：在赛车道上吗？

sentences.text_foreign: POLICEMAN: You must have been driving at seventy miles an hour.
sentences.text_local: 警察：你刚才一定是以每小时70英里的速度开车。

sentences.text_foreign: GARY: I can't have been.
sentences.text_local: 加里：我不会开得那样快的。

sentences.text_foreign: POLICEMAN: I was doing eighty when I overtook you.
sentences.text_local: 警察：我是以每小时80英里的速度赶上你的。

sentences.text_foreign: POLICEMAN: Didn't you see the speed limit?
sentences.text_local: 警察：难倒你没看见限速牌吗？

sentences.text_foreign: GARY: I'm afraid I didn't, officer.
sentences.text_local: 加里：恐怕我没看见，警官。

sentences.text_foreign: GARY: I must have been dreaming.
sentences.text_local: 加里：我一定是思想开小差了。

sentences.text_foreign: ANN: He wasn't dreaming, officer.
sentences.text_local: 安：警官，他思想没有开小差。

sentences.text_foreign: ANN: I was telling him to drive slowly.
sentences.text_local: 安：我刚才正告诉他开慢点。

sentences.text_foreign: GARY: That's why I didn't see the sign.
sentences.text_local: 加里：所以我才没看见那牌子。

sentences.text_foreign: POLICEMAN: Let me see your driving licence.
sentences.text_local: 警察：让我看一看你的驾驶执照。

sentences.text_foreign: POLICEMAN: I won't charge you this time.
sentences.text_local: 警察：这次我就不罚你款了。

sentences.text_foreign: POLICEMAN: But you'd better not do it again!
sentences.text_local: 警察：但你最好不要再开得这样快。

sentences.text_foreign: GARY: Thank you.
sentences.text_local: 加里：谢谢您。

sentences.text_foreign: GARY: I'll certainly be more careful.
sentences.text_local: 加里：我以后一定会多注意。

sentences.text_foreign: ANN: I told you to drive slowly, Gary.
sentences.text_local: 安：加里，我刚才叫你开慢点吧。

sentences.text_foreign: GARY: You always tell me to drive slowly, darling.
sentences.text_local: 加里：你总是叫我开慢点，亲爱的。

sentences.text_foreign: ANN: Well, next time you'd better take my advice!
sentences.text_local: 安：好啦，下次你最好还是听从我的劝告吧！

sentences.text_foreign: Don't be so sure!
sentences.text_local: 别那么肯定！

sentences.text_foreign: What's the problem about deciding on a holiday?
sentences.text_local: 决定如何度假有什么为难的地方？

sentences.text_foreign: MARTIN: Where are you going to spend your holidays this year, Gary?
sentences.text_local: 马丁：加里，今年你们打算去哪里度假？

sentences.text_foreign: GARY: We may go abroad.
sentences.text_local: 加里：我们可能到国外去。

sentences.text_foreign: GARY: I'm not sure.
sentences.text_local: 加里：但我不敢肯定。

sentences.text_foreign: GARY: My wife wants to go to Egypt.
sentences.text_local: 加里：我妻子想到埃及去，

sentences.text_foreign: GARY: I'd like to go there, too.
sentences.text_local: 加里：我也想去那儿。

sentences.text_foreign: GARY: We can't make up our minds.
sentences.text_local: 加里：我们还拿不定主意。

sentences.text_foreign: MARTIN: Will you travel by sea or by air?
sentences.text_local: 马丁：你们乘船去，还是乘飞机去？

sentences.text_foreign: GARY: We may travel by sea.
sentences.text_local: 加里：我们可能乘船去。

sentences.text_foreign: MARTIN: It's cheaper, isn't it?
sentences.text_local: 马丁：这更便宜些，是吗？

sentences.text_foreign: GARY: It may be cheaper, but it takes a long time.
sentences.text_local: 加里：可能是便宜些，但花的时间长。

sentences.text_foreign: MARTIN: I'm sure you'll enjoy yourselves.
sentences.text_local: 马丁：我肯定你们一定会玩得很痛快。

sentences.text_foreign: GARY: Don't be so sure.
sentences.text_local: 加里：别那么肯定。

sentences.text_foreign: GARY: We might not go anywhere.
sentences.text_local: 加里：我们可能哪里也去不成。

sentences.text_foreign: GARY: My wife always worries too much.
sentences.text_local: 加里：我妻子总是担心这担心那的。

sentences.text_foreign: GARY: Who's going to look after the dog?
sentences.text_local: 加里：谁来照看狗啦，

sentences.text_foreign: GARY: Who's going to look after the house?
sentences.text_local: 加里：谁来看管房子啦，

sentences.text_foreign: GARY: Who's going to look after the garden?
sentences.text_local: 加里：谁来照料花园啦，

sentences.text_foreign: GARY: We have this problem every year.
sentences.text_local: 加里：我们每年都碰到这类问题。

sentences.text_foreign: GARY: In the end, we stay at home and look after everything!
sentences.text_local: 加里：末了，我们呆在家里来照看一切。

sentences.text_foreign: Sensational news!
sentences.text_local: 爆炸性新闻！

sentences.text_foreign: What reasons did Karen Marsh give for wanting to retire?
sentences.text_local: 卡伦・马什说她为什么想要退休？

sentences.text_foreign: REPORTER: Have you just made a new film, Miss Marsh?
sentences.text_local: 记者：您刚拍完一部新电影吗，马什小姐？

sentences.text_foreign: MISS MARSH: Yes, I have.
sentences.text_local: 马什小姐：是的，我刚拍完。

sentences.text_foreign: REPORTER: Are you going to make another?
sentences.text_local: 记者：您准备再拍一部吗？

sentences.text_foreign: MISS MARSH: No, I'm not.
sentences.text_local: 马什小姐：不，我不准备拍了。

sentences.text_foreign: MISS MARSH: I'm going to retire.
sentences.text_local: 马什小姐：我准备退休了。

sentences.text_foreign: MISS MARSH: I feel very tired.
sentences.text_local: 马什小姐：我感觉累得很。

sentences.text_foreign: MISS MARSH: I don't want to make another film for a long time.
sentences.text_local: 马什小姐：我早就不想再拍片子了。

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: Let's buy a newspaper, Liz.
sentences.text_local: 凯特：我们买份报纸吧，莉兹。

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: Listen to this!
sentences.text_local: 凯特：你听这段：“

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: 'Karen Marsh: Sensational News! By our reporter, Alan Jones.
sentences.text_local: 凯特：卡伦・马什：爆炸性新闻！由本报记者艾伦琼斯报导。

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: Karen Marsh arrived at London Airport today.
sentences.text_local: 凯特：卡伦・马什今天到达伦敦机场。

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: She was wearing a blue dress and a mink coat.
sentences.text_local: 凯特：她穿着一身蓝色的套装和一件貂皮大衣。

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: She told me she had just made a new film.
sentences.text_local: 凯特：她告诉我她刚拍完一部新片子。

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: She said she was not going to make another.
sentences.text_local: 凯特：她说她不准备再拍电影了。

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: She said she was going to retire.
sentences.text_local: 凯特：她说她准备退休。

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: She told reporters she felt very tired and didn't want to make another film for a long time.'
sentences.text_local: 凯特：她告诉记者她感到很疲劳，早就不想再拍电影了。”

sentences.text_foreign: LIZ: I wonder why!
sentences.text_local: 莉兹：我很想知道为什么！

sentences.text_foreign: The latest report
sentences.text_local: 最新消息

sentences.text_foreign: Is Karen Marsh going to retire, do you think?
sentences.text_local: 你认为卡伦・马什会退休吗？

sentences.text_foreign: REPORTER: Are you really going to retire, Miss Marsh?
sentences.text_local: 记者：马什小姐，您真的准备退休吗？

sentences.text_foreign: MISS MARSH: I may.
sentences.text_local: 马什小姐：有可能退。

sentences.text_foreign: MISS MARSH: I can't make up my mind.
sentences.text_local: 马什小姐：我还拿不定主意。

sentences.text_foreign: MISS MARSH: I will have to ask my future husband.
sentences.text_local: 马什小姐：我得问一下我的未婚夫。

sentences.text_foreign: MISS MARSH: He won't let me make another film.
sentences.text_local: 马什小姐：他不会再让我拍电影了。

sentences.text_foreign: REPORTER: Your future husband, Miss Marsh?
sentences.text_local: 记者：您的未婚夫，马什小姐？

sentences.text_foreign: MISS MARSH: Yes, Let me introduce him to you.
sentences.text_local: 马什小姐：是的，让我把他给你们介绍一下。

sentences.text_foreign: MISS MARSH: His name is Carlos.
sentences.text_local: 马什小姐：他叫卡洛斯。

sentences.text_foreign: MISS MARSH: We're going to get married next week.
sentences.text_local: 马什小姐：下星期我们就要结婚了。

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: Look, Liz!
sentences.text_local: 凯特：看啊，莉兹！

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: Here's another report about Karen Marsh.
sentences.text_local: 凯特：这又有一篇关于卡伦・马什的报道。

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: Listen: 'Karen Marsh: The latest.
sentences.text_local: 凯特：你听，“卡伦・马什：最新消息。

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: At her London Hotel today Miss Marsh told reporters she might retire.
sentences.text_local: 凯特：今天在伦敦旅馆，马什小姐告诉记者她可能要退休。

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: She said she couldn't make up her mind.
sentences.text_local: 凯特：她说她还拿不定主意。

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: She said she would have to ask her future husband.
sentences.text_local: 凯特：她说她得问问她的未婚夫。

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: She said her future husband would not let her make another film
sentences.text_local: 凯特：她说她的未婚夫不会再让她拍电影。

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: Then she introduced us to Carlos and told us they would get married next week.'
sentences.text_local: 凯特：然后她把我们介绍给卡洛斯，并告诉我们说他们下星期结婚。”

sentences.text_foreign: LIZ: That's sensational news, isn't it, Kate?
sentences.text_local: 莉兹：凯特，这真是条轰动的消息，是不是？

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: It certainly is.
sentences.text_local: 凯特：当然啦。

sentences.text_foreign: KATE: He'll be her sixth husband!
sentences.text_local: 凯特：他将是她的第6个丈夫。

sentences.text_foreign: A pleasant dream
sentences.text_local: 美好的梦

sentences.text_foreign: What would Julie like to do, if she had the money?
sentences.text_local: 如果朱莉有那笔钱，她想做什么呢？

sentences.text_foreign: JULIE: Are you doing the football pools, Brian?
sentences.text_local: 朱莉：布莱恩，你正在下足球赛的赌注吗？

sentences.text_foreign: BRIAN: Yes, I've nearly finished, Julie.
sentences.text_local: 布莱恩：是的，我这就做完了，朱莉。

sentences.text_foreign: BRIAN: I'm sure we'll win something this week.
sentences.text_local: 布莱恩：我敢肯定这星期我们会赢一点的。

sentences.text_foreign: JULIE: You always say that, but we never win anything!
sentences.text_local: 朱莉：你老是那样说，但是我们从来没赢过！

sentences.text_foreign: JULIE: What will you do if you win a lot of money?
sentences.text_local: 朱莉：要是你赢了许多钱，你打算做什么呢？

sentences.text_foreign: BRIAN: If I win a lot of money I'll buy you a mink coat.
sentences.text_local: 布莱恩：要是我赢了许多钱，我给你买件貂皮大衣。

sentences.text_foreign: JULIE: I don't want a mink coat!
sentences.text_local: 朱莉：我不要貂皮大衣。

sentences.text_foreign: JULIE: I want to see the world.
sentences.text_local: 朱莉：我要去见见世面。

sentences.text_foreign: BRIAN: All right.
sentences.text_local: 布莱恩：好吧。

sentences.text_foreign: BRIAN: If we win a lot of money we'll travel round the world and we'll stay at the best hotels.
sentences.text_local: 布莱恩：要是我们赢了很多钱，我们就去周游世界，并且住最好的旅馆。

sentences.text_foreign: BRIAN: Then we'll return home and buy a big house in the country.
sentences.text_local: 布莱恩：然后我们返回家园，在乡下买幢大房子。

sentences.text_foreign: BRIAN: We'll have a beautiful garden and ...
sentences.text_local: 布莱恩：我们将有一个漂亮的花园和……

sentences.text_foreign: JULIE: But if we spend all that money we'll be poor again.
sentences.text_local: 朱莉：但是如果我们把所有钱都花光了，我们又会变穷的。

sentences.text_foreign: JULIE: What'll we do then?
sentences.text_local: 朱莉：那时我们怎么办？

sentences.text_foreign: BRIAN: If we spend all the money we'll try and win the football pools again.
sentences.text_local: 布莱恩：如果我们花光了所有钱，我们设法在足球赛赌注上再赢一次。

sentences.text_foreign: JULIE: It's a pleasant dream but everything depends on 'if'!
sentences.text_local: 朱莉：这是个美好的梦，但一切都取决于“如果”！

sentences.text_foreign: Is that you, John?
sentences.text_local: 是你吗，约翰？

sentences.text_foreign: Which John Smith does Graham Turner think he is talking to?
sentences.text_local: 格雷厄姆・特纳以为他在和哪一个约翰・史密斯通话？

sentences.text_foreign: GRAHAM TURNER: Is that you, John?
sentences.text_local: 格雷厄姆・特纳：是你吗，约翰？

sentences.text_foreign: JOHN SMITH: Yes, speaking.
sentences.text_local: 约翰・史密斯：是我，请讲。

sentences.text_foreign: GRAHAM TURNER: Tell Mary we'll be late for dinner this evening.
sentences.text_local: 格雷厄姆・特纳：你告诉玛丽，今晚吃饭我们将晚到一会儿。

sentences.text_foreign: JOHN SMITH: I'm afraid I don't understand.
sentences.text_local: 约翰・史密斯：恐怕我还不明白您的意思。

sentences.text_foreign: GRAHAM TURNER: Hasn't Mary told you?
sentences.text_local: 格雷厄姆・特纳：玛丽没有告诉你吗？

sentences.text_foreign: GRAHAM TURNER: She invited Charlotte and me to dinner this evening.
sentences.text_local: 格雷厄姆・特纳：她邀请我和夏洛特今晚去吃饭。

sentences.text_foreign: GRAHAM TURNER: I said I would be at your house at six o'clock,
sentences.text_local: 格雷厄姆・特纳：我说过我6点到你家，

sentences.text_foreign: GRAHAM TURNER: but the boss wants me to do some extra work.
sentences.text_local: 格雷厄姆・特纳：但老板要我加班。

sentences.text_foreign: GRAHAM TURNER: I'll have to stay at the office.
sentences.text_local: 格雷厄姆・特纳：我不得不留在办公室，

sentences.text_foreign: GRAHAM TURNER: I don't know when I'll finish.
sentences.text_local: 格雷厄姆・特纳：不知道什么时候才能结束。

sentences.text_foreign: GRAHAM TURNER: Oh, and by the way,
sentences.text_local: 格雷厄姆・特纳：喔，顺便问一句，

sentences.text_foreign: GRAHAM TURNER: my wife wants to know if Mary needs any help.
sentences.text_local: 格雷厄姆・特纳：我妻子想知道玛丽是否需要帮忙。

sentences.text_foreign: JOHN SMITH: I don't know what you're talking about.
sentences.text_local: 约翰・史密斯：我不知道您在说些什么。

sentences.text_foreign: GRAHAM TURNER: That is John Smith, isn't it?
sentences.text_local: 格雷厄姆・特纳：你是约翰・史密斯，对吗？

sentences.text_foreign: JOHN SMITH: Yes, I'm John Smith.
sentences.text_local: 约翰・史密斯：是的，我是约翰・史密斯。

sentences.text_foreign: GRAHAM TURNER: You are John Smith, the engineer, aren't you?
sentences.text_local: 格雷厄姆・特纳：你是工程师约翰・史密斯，对吗？

sentences.text_foreign: JOHN SMITH: That's right.
sentences.text_local: 约翰・史密斯：对。

sentences.text_foreign: GRAHAM TURNER: You work for the Overseas Engineering Company, don't you?
sentences.text_local: 格雷厄姆・特纳：你在海外工程公司上班，是吗？

sentences.text_foreign: JOHN SMITH: No, I don't.
sentences.text_local: 约翰・史密斯：不，不是。

sentences.text_foreign: JOHN SMITH: I'm John Smith the telephone engineer and I'm repairing your telephone line.
sentences.text_local: 约翰・史密斯：我是电话工程师约翰・史密斯，我正在修理您的电话线。

sentences.text_foreign: Sally's first train ride
sentences.text_local: 萨莉的第一次乘火车旅行

sentences.text_foreign: Why was the mother embarrassed?
sentences.text_local: 为什么母亲感到很尴尬？

sentences.text_foreign: Last week, my four-year-old daughter, Sally, was invited to a children's party.
sentences.text_local: 上周，我4岁的女儿萨莉被邀请去参加一个儿童聚会。

sentences.text_foreign: I decided to take her by train.
sentences.text_local: 我决定带她乘火车去。

sentences.text_foreign: Sally was very excited because she had never travelled on a train before.
sentences.text_local: 萨莉非常激动，因为她从未乘过火车。

sentences.text_foreign: She sat near the window and asked questions about everything she saw.
sentences.text_local: 她靠车窗坐着，对她所看到的一切都要问个明白。

sentences.text_foreign: Suddenly, a middle-aged lady got on the train and sat opposite Sallly.
sentences.text_local: 突然，一个中年妇女上了火车，坐在萨莉的对面。

sentences.text_foreign: 'Hello, little girl,' she said.
sentences.text_local: “你好，小姑娘，” 她说。

sentences.text_foreign: Sally did not answer,
sentences.text_local: 萨莉没回答，

sentences.text_foreign: but looked at her curiously.
sentences.text_local: 却好奇地看着她。

sentences.text_foreign: The lady was dressed in a blue coat and a large, funny hat.
sentences.text_local: 那位妇女穿着一件蓝色的大衣，戴着一顶大而滑稽的帽子。

sentences.text_foreign: After the train had left the station,
sentences.text_local: 火车开出站后，

sentences.text_foreign: the lady opened her handbag and took out her powder compact.
sentences.text_local: 那位妇女打开了手提包，拿出了粉盒。

sentences.text_foreign: She then began to make up her face.
sentences.text_local: 然后她开始打扮起来。

sentences.text_foreign: Why are you doing that?' Sally asked.
sentences.text_local: “你为什么要那样做呢？” 萨莉问。

sentences.text_foreign: 'To make myself beautiful,' the lady answered.
sentences.text_local: “为了把自己打扮漂亮啊，” 那位妇女答道。

sentences.text_foreign: She put away her compact and smiled kindly.
sentences.text_local: 她放好了粉盒，慈祥地笑着。

sentences.text_foreign: 'But you are still ugly,' Sally said.
sentences.text_local: “可是你仍然难看呀，” 萨莉说。

sentences.text_foreign: Sally was amused, but I was very embarrassed!
sentences.text_local: 萨莉感到很有趣，而我却很尴尬。

sentences.text_foreign: A walk through the woods
sentences.text_local: 林中散步

sentences.text_foreign: What was so funny about the words on the sign?
sentences.text_local: 牌子上的字有什么可笑的地方？

sentences.text_foreign: I live in a very old town which is surrounded by beautiful woods.
sentences.text_local: 我住在一个由美丽的树林环绕的古老小镇上。

sentences.text_foreign: It is a famous beauty spot.
sentences.text_local: 这是一个著名的风景胜地。

sentences.text_foreign: On Sundays, hundreds of people come from the city to see our town and to walk through the woods.
sentences.text_local: 每逢星期天，有许许多多人从城里来观赏我们的小镇，并在树林中散步。

sentences.text_foreign: Visitors have been asked to keep the woods clean and tidy.
sentences.text_local: 游客已被告知要保持树林的整洁。

sentences.text_foreign: Litter baskets have been placed under the trees,
sentences.text_local: 树下都已设置了废物筐，

sentences.text_foreign: but people still throw their rubbish everywhere.
sentences.text_local: 但是人们仍到处扔垃圾。

sentences.text_foreign: Last Wednesday, I went for a walk in the woods.
sentences.text_local: 上星期三我到树林里去散步。

sentences.text_foreign: What I saw made me very sad.
sentences.text_local: 我所见到的一切使我非常难过。

sentences.text_foreign: I counted seven old cars and three old refrigerators.
sentences.text_local: 我数了一下，有7辆旧汽车和3个旧冰箱。

sentences.text_foreign: The litter baskets were empty and the ground was covered with pieces of paper, cigarette ends, old tyres, empty bottles and rusty tins.
sentences.text_local: 废物筐是空的，而满地都是纸片、烟头、旧轮胎、空瓶子和生锈的空罐头盒。

sentences.text_foreign: Among the rubbish, I found a sign which said,
sentences.text_local: 在垃圾堆中我发现了一块牌子，上面写着：

sentences.text_foreign: 'Anyone who leaves litter in these woods will be prosecuted!'
sentences.text_local: “凡在此树林里丢弃垃圾者，将依法处置。”
